messages.subject: "have to"
messages.msgSnippet: -=- Do you have a maid ? I don t . I HAVE to do other work. -=- I didn t add the caps. Another HUGE boost to understanding how unschooling can work well is to
messages.messageBody:
-=-
Do you have a maid ? I don't . I HAVE to do other work.
-=-


I didn't add the caps.
Another HUGE boost to understanding how unschooling can work well is to see
the choices we make, and to see them as the choices they are.

Links and various people's examples are here:
http://sandradodd.com/haveto

-=-
My hubby is rarely around and it is just me and a HUGE house.
-=-

You could choose to live in only a few rooms, or to move to a smaller
house, or to hire help.
Not choosing those things, is a choice, too.
Thinking in terms of "have to" makes a person feel helpless and frustrated.
Thinking in terms of choices is strenghthening and expansive.

Sandra



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
